Latest W3C test suite

NOTE: These tests require a running HTTP server to execute.
If you have PHP7 installed you can start the embedded HTTP server executing the
shell script "w3c-test.php" that you can find in the "test" directory.

NOTE: In each of the tests of this section (Latest W3C test suite), it is possible to press CTRL+ALT keys to switch between native (#w3) and nwsapi (#nw)

WPT /dom/nodes/ - querySelector, querySelectorAll, matches, closest (Level 4):

  • querySelector All - XHTML
  • querySelector All - HTML
  • Element Matches
  • Element Closest

WPT /html/semantics/selectors/pseudo-classes - (Level 4):

  • checked-001-manual.html
  • checked.html
  • checked-type-change.html
  • default.html
  • dir.html (not implemented) (not implemented)
  • dir01.html (not implemented) (not implemented)
  • disabled.html
  • enabled.html
  • focus-autofocus.html
  • focus.html (fails 1 in Firefox) (fails 1 in Chrome/Safari/Opera)
  • indeterminate-radio.html
  • indeterminate-type-change.html
  • indeterminate.html
  • in-range-out-ofrange-type-change.html
  • in-range-out-ofrange.html (fails 6 in Firefox)
  • link.html (fails 2 in Firefox) (fails 2 in Chrome/Safari/Opera)
  • placeholder-shown-type-change.html (fails 1 in Firefox)
  • readwrite-readonly-type-change.html (fails 1 in Firefox)
  • readwrite-readonly.html (fails 2 in Firefox) (fails 2 in Chrome/Safari/Opera)
  • required-optional-hidden.html (fails 1 in Firefox)
  • required-optional.html
  • valid-invalid.html
